articles.author: Ian Mangan
articles.title: RTE boss apologises over weather and climate change coverage amid Ireland heatwave - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The state broadcaster had been subject to much criticism for its coverage of the flooding events across Europe as well as the heatwave in Ireland
articles.content:
An RTE boss has apologised for the broadcaster's recent coverage of flooding across Europe.
